meta.title: Sudelsc
meta.subtitle: A SuperCollider Notebook
meta.description: First test for publishing SuperCollider notes with hexo + hipaper theme
meta.author: Iannis Zannos

posts.title: Code rendering test
posts.text: This is just a test. Testing how hexo / hipaper renders supercollider code. //: record test buffer with an ascending sine wave. { var sound; Server.default.prepareForRecord; 0.1.wait; { SinOsc.ar (Line.kr (300, 3000, 3), 0, 0.1) }.play; 0.1.wait; Server.default.record; 1.wait; Server.default.stopRecording; "done".postln; }.fork; Author: IOANNIS ZANNOS Created: 2017-05-05 Fri 18:36 Validate

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: First org-mode test
posts.text: This is just a test. Creating some sections to see how contents look. Section 1 subsection 2 Section 2 The hipaper theme works fine with the org-mode plugin. Author: IOANNIS ZANNOS Created: 2017-05-05 Fri 18:15 Validate
